nodes.text: Operation: Clodhopper was an online adventure published at Wizards.com on February 13, 2001 for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, based on the "Defoliation Agenda" story idea from the Secrets of Naboo campaign pack.
Shortly after the Battle of Naboo, a group of adventurers are employed by an ecoterrorist group to transport dangerous animals off Naboo for political gain.
